media.alt: Neurous Net; Pull in all the particles
media.caption: Right-Click (or Tap & Hold) to pull in all the particles!

media.alt: Neurous Net; Pulling in near by particles
media.caption: Left-Click (or Tap & Drag) to grab near by particles

media.alt: Neurous Net; Spawn some black holes
media.caption: Middle-Click (or Tap with Two Fingers) to spawn in some black holes!
